item.title: Riddler Solutions: Perfect Bowl & Magnetic Volume
item.description: Riddler Express Riddler Classic Area of the base of the pyramid Height of the pyramid Encode functions and calculate volumes Appendix This post contains solutions to FiveThirtyEightâ€™s two riddles released 2020-01-31, Riddler Express and Riddler Classic. Code for figures and solutions can be found on my github page. Riddler Express The riddle: At the recent World Indoor Bowls Championships in Great Yarmouth, England, one of the rolls by Nick Brett went viral.
